attributes.comment:
Docket ID: USCIS-2006-0044

This fee increase is quite burdensome to the immigration community. The
exorbitant fee increase is justified if and only if all the money collected is
used by the agency to improve the broken immigration benefit system. There is a
considerable amount of doubt that the money collected via immigration fees are
used to finance border security and not merely to cover the administrative and
service expenses.

It looks like that the department of homeland security considers the immigration
applicant pool as the goose that lays golden eggs, and now, the department is
bent on killing this goose to get more money.

On one hand, the government talks about tax relief, but on the other hand, they
nullify the relief by such exorbitant fee increases from the constituents.

Please stop this fee increase.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Dilipkumar V. Patel
